title: Fireside with the Underboss _ "I Got A Beautician License And A Bullet In The Chest"
description: A veteran, a student, a Ramper, and now a licensed beautician, Sammy's resume seems to be expanding constantly. In this story, Sammy tells us about the time he took his first bullet while in beauty school.
itunes:author: Sammy "The Bull" Gravano
itunes:subtitle: A veteran, a student, a Ramper, and now a licensed beautician, Sammy's resume seems to be expanding constantly. In this story, Sammy tells us about the time he took his first bullet while in beauty school.
